imdb.title: Ranma ½
imdb.plot: A girl is involuntarily engaged to a boy who turns female when hit with cold water and male when hit with hot.

episodes.title: Chûgoku kara kita aitsu! Chotto hen!!
episodes.plot: The introduction of the Saotomes and the Tendos. Representative families of the "Anything Goes School of Martial Arts".

episodes.title: Asobi ja nainoyo gakkou wa
episodes.plot: Akane and Ranma wind up both attending Furinkan High School. But at the school gates, all male members of the school sports clubs are lying in wait to attack.

episodes.title: Ikinari ai no arashi chotto matteyo
episodes.plot: Tatewaki Kuno, captain of the school Kendo club and in love with Akane Tendo, finds out that Ranma is Akane's fiancé. He relentlessly challenges Ranma to battle...

episodes.title: Ranma to Ranma? Gokai ga tomaranai
episodes.plot: Kuno has fallen in love with the "pigtailed girl." Kuno, who has no idea who she really is, calls out Ranma in order to entrust him with a present...

episodes.title: Hone made aishite? Akane koi o fukuzatsu kossetsu
episodes.plot: After a big fight, Ranma is beaten up badly by Akane. She takes him to Dr. Tofu's clinic to be treated...

episodes.title: Akane no shitsuren datte shouganai janai
episodes.plot: The great Dr. Tofu is tending to Ranma's wounds when Kasumi stops by. The second Dr. Tofu lays eyes on her, he is unable to contain himself.

episodes.title: Toujou! Eien no mayoigo Ryouga
episodes.plot: A strange young man appears at Furinkan High School in search of Ranma. When he sees him, he exclaims "Ranma! Prepare to die!" and attacks!

episodes.title: Gakkou wa senjouda! Taiketsu Ryouma vs Ryouga
episodes.plot: Ryoga and Ranma fight inside Furinkan school grounds, leading Ryoga to find out about the Ranma's Jusenkyo curse.

episodes.title: Otome hakusho Kami wa inochinano
episodes.plot: Stuck in the middle of a fight between Ranma and Ryoga, Akane's long hair is chopped off by Ryoga's bandana sword. Concerned for her, Ranma ditches the fight and tends to the dumbfounded Akane.

episodes.title: Pî pî P-chan Roku na monjanee
episodes.plot: It turns out Ryoga is also a victim of Jusenkyo, turning into a baby pig every time he is splashed with cold water. Akane, who does not yet know this, vows to keep the piglet and let it sleep in her bed. When Ranma hears this...

episodes.title: Ranma o gekiai! Shintaisou no sukeban toujou
episodes.plot: When the entire Furinkan High Martial Arts Rhythmic Gymnastics Club is injured before their match with St. Hebereke High School, the members ask Akane to step in. When Kodachi, captain from the rival school, hears this, she plans an ambush!

episodes.title: Onna no koi wa snesouyo! Kakutou shintaisou de iza shoubu
episodes.plot: Upon finding out that Ranma is Akane's fiancé, Kodachi decides to wager him on the next match. But when Akane sprains her ankle during training, it's Ranma who stands in for her?!

episodes.title: Sukeban no me ni namida? Rûru muyou no kakutou shintaisou kecchaku
episodes.plot: The day of the Martial Arts Rhythmic Gymnastic Challenge is finally here! Barehanded attacks are illegal in this sudden-death duel with no time limit. The battle is about to begin as Akane and Kuno look on from the crowd.

episodes.title: Kotsuban uranai! Ranma wa nihonichi no oyomesan
episodes.plot: Dr. Tofu's mother, Kin, tries to persuade her son to get married by presenting him with tons of photos of bride candidates. But Dr. Tofu doesn't have the heart to tell his mother there's someone else he's interested in. In the meantime, Akane does her best to stop Dr. Tofu's arranged marriage.

episodes.title: Gekiretsu shoujo Shanpû toujou! Watashi inochi azukemasu
episodes.plot: Ranma and Akane are enjoying a parfait at the cafe when a beautiful young girl named Shampoo suddenly appears before them! Exclaiming "I kill Ranma!" she relentlessly chases him!

episodes.title: Shanpû no hangeki! Hissatsu shiatsuken wa mimo kokomo ubau
episodes.plot: Shampoo fixes "lunch with love" for Ranma, but what he finds inside the lunchbox is P-chan! Shampoo challenges the infuriated Akane to a fight with the "Kiss of Death."

episodes.title: Ranma daisuki! Sayonara wa iwanaide!!
episodes.plot: Thanks to Shampoo's Shiatsu technique, Akane has completely forgotten about Ranma's very existence! In order to get Blend 119, which is needed to restore her memories, Shampoo issues an unbelievable condition!

episodes.title: Ore wa otokoda! Ranma chuugoku ni kaeru?
episodes.plot: Another night at the Tendo Dojo, Ranma and Genma continue to "train" and cause a ruckus. Ranma, fed up with his father, declares that he's going back to China!
